title: Descendants of the Dragon
description: Zee is a career driven paleontologist who eats, sleeps, and breathes dinosaurs. When she receives an unexpected invitation from her godfather -- a conservation scientist in China -- to join a select team of scientists in researching a classified project, she canâ€™t resist the opportunity. After fighting lifelong embarrassment and stereotypes associated with her heritage, she finds herself leaving the familiarity of home for an adventure in the country of her parents birth. When a dangerous organized crime syndicate catches word of the discovery, Zee is forced to confront the demons from her past while fighting the real world monsters who threaten to take everything her team has worked for. Never in a million years could she predict how this journey will change her life.
author: Kelcey Hill
